item.title: StateFlow em KMP e SwiftUI
item.description: A maior vantagem do Kotlin Multiplatform (KMP) é a possibilidade de reutilizar a lógica de negócio entre plataformas, como um framework/módulo separado, mantendo a UI implementada nas bibliotecas nativas (SwiftUI ou Jetpack Compose).
item.dc:creator: Igor Ferreira

item.title: StateFlow on KMP and SwiftUI
item.description: The greatest feature with Kotlin Multiplatform (KMP) is the possibility to re-use the business logic between platforms, as a separate framework/module while keeping the UI implemented in the native libraries (SwiftUI or Jetpack Compose).
item.dc:creator: Igor Ferreira

item.title: Using DynamicNavigationDestinationLink
item.description: Because of a thread on Twitter, I created this simple gist with an attempt to simulate the use of DynamicNavigationDestinationLink to display a content fetched from an external source, it may be useful for you on trying to find a solution for your crashes.
item.dc:creator: Igor Ferreira
